critique: This document is an executive order that makes an exception to the mandatory retirement age for a specific government employee. It does not seem to have any implications for ideological tilt, immigration, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion. The only axis that it touches on is executive power, as it is an example of the executive branch using its authority to make a specific exception to a rule. However, this is a fairly minor action and does not represent a significant expansion of executive power.
